# Question One

#### A.
```{r}
z <- 1.1 ^ 2.2 ^ 3.3

print(z)
```


#### B.
```{r}
z <- (1.1 ^ 2.2) ^ 3.3

print(z)
```

#### C.
```{r}
z <- 3 * 1.1 ^ 3 + 2 * 1.1 ^ 2 + 1

print(z)
```

# Question Two
#### A.
```{r}
x <- c(seq(1, 7), 8, seq(7,1))

print(x)
```

#### B.
```{r}
y <- seq(1:5)

print(y)

rep(x=y, times=y)
```

#### C.
```{r}
c <- seq(5:1)

print(c)

rep(x=c, times=c, each=c)
```
